articles.author: Jordan Middler
articles.title: Ubisoft is closing 'unused' accounts, disabling access to purchased games | VGC - Video Games Chronicle
articles.description: Ubisoft will reportedly cancel inactive Ubisoft Accounts for inactivity, which will reportedly disable game access.
articles.content:
Ubisoft is cancelling “unused” Ubisoft Accounts, disabling users’ access to their purchased games.
According to a user on Twitter, they received an email from Ubisoft warning that should they not cl… [+1719 chars]

articles.author: Cameron Duke
articles.title: Why do spiders have 8 legs? - Livescience.com
articles.description: Spiders' ancestors evolved to use their appendages in very weird ways.
articles.content:
There seems to be no ideal number of legs. Humans have two, dogs have four, insects have six and millipedes can have over 1,000
. So what made spiders settle for eight legs? 
"I think the best answ… [+4800 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Discover Planets Behaving In A Way Never Seen Before - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: Researchers found planets behaving in a way that has been theorized, yet never observed before, until now.

articles.title: Phobos The "Doomed" Moon Is Going To Crash Into Mars - IFLScience
articles.content: NASA's Perseverance Rover captured a gorgeous view of Phobos eclipsing the Sun, from the surface of Mars. From the point of view of any Martian microbes lurking out there, the eclipse may have seemed… [+2247 chars]
